meanings.definition: Consisting of both letters and numbers.
meanings.sent1: The password must be alphanumerical to ensure security.
meanings.sent2: The student ID is an alphanumerical code used for identification.
meanings.sent3: The alphanumerical puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an alphanumerical code, full of complexity and order.
meanings.sent5: The alphanumerical pattern on the screen was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: Relating to a combination of letters and numbers.
meanings.sent1: The alphanumerical format of the document made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The website required an alphanumerical password for login.
meanings.sent3: The alphanumerical design of the logo was both creative and practical.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like an alphanumerical mix, blending logic and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The alphanumerical code on the package indicated its contents clearly.
